abstract: Dana Jennings reviews scary books Paradise Tales by Geoff Ryman, Two Worlds and In Between: The Best of Caitlin R Kiernan by Caitlin R Kiernan, and The Bible Repairman and Other Stories by Tim Powers.
snippet: Caitlín R. Kiernan, Geoff Ryman and Tim Powers in collections of their darkest and scariest tales.
lead_paragraph: Caitlín R. Kiernan, Geoff Ryman and Tim Powers in collections of their darkest and scariest tales.

headline.main: Masters at Giving People the Creeps of the Kind That Keep on Creeping
headline.print_headline: Masters at Giving People the Creeps of the Kind That Keep on Creeping
headline.seo: Caitlín R. Kiernan, Geoff Ryman and Tim Powers Tales - Review
